name: WooCommerce Seeder
description: Seeds the database with WooCommerce test data

steps.command: wc product create --name='Sample Product 1' --type=simple --regular_price=19.99 --description='A sample product for testing.'
wc product create --name='Sample Product 2' --type=simple --regular_price=29.99 --description='Another sample product.'
wc product create --name='Premium Product' --type=simple --regular_price=99.99 --sale_price=79.99 --description='A premium product on sale.'
